participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and nurturing, always looking out for others. Has a good sense of humor.
participant_1.background: I'm expecting triplets in three months. I already have stepchildren. I recently moved to this country. I just moved into my first home. I work at a school.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Playful and active, enjoys physical activities and has a light-hearted approach to life.
participant_2.background: I have short hair. I go to the gym regularly. Eating is something I do when I'm bored. Two dogs live with me. I like doing the treadmill and rowing machine.
